price: Basi ikauonja ubaya wa mambo yake; na mwisho wa mambo yao ilikuwa khasara.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا
footnotes: Wakagugumia malipo maovu ya mambo yao. Na ukawa mwisho wa mambo yao ni kukhasiri kukubwa mno.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
